title: geodetic
description: Parameters for defining the shape of the earth.

datumIdentifier.description: The identification given to the reference system used for defining the coordinates of points.

ellipsoidIdentifier.description: The identification given to established representations of the Earth's shape.

semiMajorAxis.description: The radius of the equatorial axis of the ellipsoid.

denominatorOfFlatteningRatio.description: The denominator of the ratio of the difference between the equatorial and polar radii of the ellipsoid when the numerator is set to 1.
